10.InfoPage: Tipping is customary in restaurants in the United States. Make sure to treat people appropriately regardless of your financial goals.
10.UpdateBlurb: On your way out, you are stopped by the wait staff, taken out by the dumpsters and beaten up. You end up in the hospital with a text message informing you that you are now single and your bill is totalling $8,000.
